title: Green Veggie Split Pea Soup
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '2 celery sticks, sliced', '2 potatoes, diced', '150g dried split peas', '2 bay leaves', '1.5 litres vegetable stock', '2 courgettes, diced', '1 head broccoli, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '200g fresh spinach, washed and chopped', 'salt to taste']
